biotools.summary: It searches for relevant associations of transcription factors with a transcription factor target, in specific genomic regions. It also allows to evaluate the Importance Index distribution of transcription factors (and combinations of transcription factors) in association rules.

bioschemas.name: TFARM
bioschemas.summary: It searches for relevant associations of transcription factors with a transcription factor target, in specific genomic regions. It also allows to evaluate the Importance Index distribution of transcription factors (and combinations of transcription factors) in association rules.
